issue.title: [Integration] Update integration test to use generated binaries to ensure backwards compatibility
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6318](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6318). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Generate stream/file data and check it in to the testing package.  Update the integration script to have additional tests that run against the pregenerated artificats.

comments.body:
